General.Name: Remington Resources Inc
General.Description: Remington Resources Inc., a natural resource company, engages in the acquisition and exploration of mineral properties in Canada. The company was formerly known as Goldera Resources Inc. and changed its name to Remington Resources Inc. in April 2006. The company was incorporated in 2004 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 400-837 West Hastings Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 3N6
